EFI Packaging Suite

Pioneers in software solutions for packaging manufacturers

Empower. Evolve. Excite.

Contact Us
Existing Customers
Because the Packaging Suite is designed specifically for the packaging industry, it fits what we do out-of-the-box. But with the enhancements EFI has developed over the years, our system is a true hand-in-glove solution.

Jonas Kretz, Group IT manager, A&R Carton

We have generated greater efficiencies through achieving tighter margins across the business.

Andrew Hartwig, Managing Director, Firststan Quality Packaging

We are linking shop floor data collection with AC4D and automated scheduling with PrintFlow to add more value and productivity gains to our Radius solution. It makes Netpak more efficient, and uniquely positions us against our competitors.

Georges Berbari, Chief Operating Officer, Netpak

Purpose-Built Packaging ERP software for business management

Connected workflow technology to Empower

The EFI Packaging Suite enables you to unlock your full potential, empower your workforce, and excite your customers. Purpose-built to fulfil the demands of the Packaging industry, business leaders producing labels, folding cartons, flexible packaging, plastic extrusion and other printed materials rely on the EFI Packaging ERP software solution to effectively manage their business and manufacturing operations enabling a solid platform for future growth with built in contingency solutions.

The Packaging suite offers your business a comprehensive portfolio of efficiency improving workflow solutions that are flexible enough to handle any type of packaging manufacturing process. From order acquisition through to shipping, the EFI Packaging Suite solutions offers streamlined automation and business optimization that will transform how you interact with your customers, manage data, track jobs, ship products and make decisions helping you unlock your full revenue and profit potential.

Business Intelligence

Business Intelligence (BI) allows you to perform sophisticated performance analyses and reporting to get up-to-the-minute views of your business. BI accesses data from the Radius ERP system, consolidates it through flexible performance dashboards and offers ‘what-if’ analysis tools for a comprehensive view of your organization’s past, current and future performance.

Learn More →

eCRM

EFI CRM connects your sales team with critical information about your customers and prospects. Whether in the office or on the road, CRM users can view and maintain customer account information, create, update and track sales opportunities and record activities against contacts stored in the Radius ERP system.

Learn More →

Packaging-specific Estimating

Speed, accuracy and profitability are key areas addressed with the Radius estimating system. Containing the unique specifications of label, folding carton, and flexible packaging production processes, Radius estimating includes extensive product-specific template libraries. Profitable estimates are made easier with intelligent routing logic, which recommends the most efficient production routing path for each job.

Learn More →

Purchasing & Inventory Management

The system’s purchasing capabilities provide visibility and automation to help you refine your procurement processes and secure best pricing from your preferred vendors. As live information shared between the shop floor, scheduling, and other parts of the ERP system, inventory management becomes more accurate and you are able to make sure the right materials are available when and where they are needed.

Learn More →

MRP

MRP helps improve workflows. By importing customer sales and demand forecasts, authorized users are able to adjust production in order to reduce inventory and WIP. As information updates related to job required dates, job quantities and the creation of new jobs become automated, you save time, money and gain valuable insight to easily spot opportunities to relieve bottlenecks and optimize your plant.

Learn More →

Scheduling & Plant Optimization

The packaging and label industry’s most powerful scheduling capabilities continually synchronize operations based on delivery priorities, job characteristics and restraints related to equipment, materials, tooling and employees. Automatically optimized schedules greatly increase throughput across your entire operation. As communication improves, bottlenecks become eliminated, overtime is reduced and capacity utilization increases, you see the effects on your bottom line. Learn more about TGO and how EFI Printflow could optimize your plant.

Learn More →

Tooling Library & Tracking

The extensive tooling library allows you to associate tools to jobs and track usage over time so you know when tools need to be removed from use for maintenance or replacement. The integrated tooling library enhances the optimization of your estimating and production processes as important tooling information is easily accessed by other parts of the system.

Learn More →

CAD & Prepress Integration

Integrations with industry-leading CAD and prepress systems, such as Esko Automation Engine and Kodak Prinergy, streamline and accelerate workflows. As information is transferred automatically between EFI Radius and these programs, touchpoints are eliminated, information becomes accurate and files are made available for easy access later in the production process.

Learn More →

DMI / Shop Floor Data Collection

As machine operators receive prioritized work lists and instructions on the shop floor, managers gain a live view of plant operations. Make-ready, run and down times, as well as job counts are automatically collected by the system and made available for analysis in the job costing and Business Intelligence modules, allowing management teams to clearly understand where costs can be cut and profits can be enhanced. Learn more about Autocount 4D

Learn More →

eCommerce and Collaboration

EFI™ MarketDirect PackCentral is the award-winning flexible order management solution that offers simple and intuitive procurement tools enabling your customers to place orders from a dedicated site.

Learn More →

Quality Management

By setting up quality tests for specific raw materials, vendors, finished goods or customers, you can ensure that quality materials are being placed into inventory and that your customers are receiving the products they expect. As quality issues arise, you can create corrective action reports. And, through integration with DMI/Shop Floor Data Collection and scheduling, rework and schedule changes become less disruptive.

Learn More →

Job costing

Robust job costing capabilities enable you to automatically collect actual costs against jobs so you can compare performance with standards and estimates, compute WIP calculations and determine accurate labor and material recoveries for accounting purposes. Organizations that can quickly identify and understand variances are able to make proactive changes to minimize costs and increase profits

Learn More →

Sales Order Management

With highly flexible options and robust capabilities, you can greatly increase your sales order management efficiency with Radius ERP. Sales orders and item sales prices can be automatically created from existing estimates, or users can make changes as needed. Repetitive or contract pricing situations are handled with ease by using agreed upon prices held in the system. From performing credit checks to creating call-off schedules, you can easily meet the needs of your customers and internal processes.

Learn More →

Productivity Workbench

Productivity workbench is core strength of the suite. From streamlined screen navigation, intuitive hyperlinked shortcuts and instant chat messaging, productivity workbench enables enhanced collaboration, communication and productivity to all system users.

Learn More →

How can the EFI Packaging Suite help my business

The EFI Packaging Suite has helped packaging converters from across the globe excel with future ready technology solutions that has streamlined their business and processes bringing an unprecedented level of clarity to the key areas that affect profitability and efficiency. See how the suite could help your business by downloading this infographic of benefits.
